name: Magnetic Robots
description:
A small puzzle game where you must guide the two magnetic robots to energize the teleportation plataforms.

Credits:

  • Game Design: Danilo Tuzita, Raphael Griffo, Gabriel Griffo
  • Gameplay Programming: Danilo Tuzita, Raphael Griffo
  • Puzzle Design: Danilo Tuzita
  • Art: Gabriel Griffo
  • Some sprites were taken from Kenney
  • Sound Effects:  Kenney
  • Music: maou
  • Font designed by Kimberly Geswein
